person.persName: Richard L. South, Jr. (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier.)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Richard L. South, Sr., and Sarah "Sally" South. Resident of Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Breathitt County in 1860. Served in the 5th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a sergeant from September 18, 1862, to May 28, 1864. Killed at the Battle of Dallas, Paulding County, Georgia, on May 28, 1864.
